Union_City.Linden Yard:
Linden Yard is the name of two separate railroad freight yards in Linden, New Jersey, United States. One is owned by the Staten Island Railway (SIR) of New York City, and the other is managed by Conrail Shared Assets Operations along the Northeast Corridor (NEC) right of way.


== Staten Island Railway ==
The Staten Island Railway operates a 19-track freight yard.
